title: Flesh To Gold
tags: how to acquire flesh to stone
content:
o Gold is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Flesh to Gold is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Flesh to Gold is identical to Flesh to Stone, however the effects of Flesh to Gold are permanent, do not require concentration, and does not expend a spell slot (since it is a scroll). For these reasons, it is one of the strongest spells in the game.
